summary: This mod adds khajiit camp in Falskaar Amber Creek.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds khajiit camp in Falskaar Amber Creek.

REQUIRES: FALSKAAR
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37994/?


There is a bed roll and safe chest for you. It also add female merchant and two male followers.

Bahdah is merchant. She buy and sell you stuff 24/h. She just stay at camp and cannot use as follower.

Ma\'Ra is one handed warrior follower. He goes shopping 9.00 - 10.00 am.

Ra\'To is two handed warrior follower. He goes drinking in Amber Mead in weekends 20- 24.

They all are essentials so they can\'t die and all are level 120. 

No dirty edits. Cleaned with TES5Edit.

Credits: Alexander J. Velicky - Falskaar

- Version 0.2 : Fixed Bahdad not sell or buy if you didn\'t have merchant perk.
author: Jermu73
